definitions.definition: A cylindrical mechanical fastener that attaches multiple parts together by fitting through a hole and deforming the head(s) at either end.
Any fixed point or certain basis.
A light kind of footman's plate armour; an almain rivet .

main_definition: A cylindrical mechanical fastener that attaches multiple parts together by fitting through a hole and deforming the head(s) at either end.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) Any fixed point or certain basis.
( obsolete ) A light kind of footman's plate armour; an almain rivet .
